title: GlobalExchange
author: GlobalExchange
content: Dear members of the Forum,At this point we are looking for reasonable and reliable exchangers who can exchange bank transfers to crypto for us. We send the transaction with the agreed amount to the account of your choice and you send us back the corresponding amount in Crypto (BTC, ETH, XMR, whatever you want).We are happy to talk about your percentages privately, so feel free to let us know your ideas.Contact is possible via Telegram, Skype or Jabber. We will send you our ID here via the forum.If you have any questions, offers or want to help us, please contact us via PM. We need daily exchanges with larger sums.

comments.author: alterra57
comments.body: Hello,Do you have a Discord or Wickr account? I can offer you this service if we agree on working together. Feel free to DM me with your username or questions.Regards.

comments.author: joaonev
comments.body: Hi,I can help you with the exchange you need.Please contact with PMKind regards

comments.author: burugcrypto
comments.body: Your DM is disabled . Please DM me here.Â  We can set a deal.

comments.author: CryptoRollaOTC
comments.body: Quote from: GlobalExchange on October 06, 2022, 11:51:09 AMDear members of the Forum,At this point we are looking for reasonable and reliable exchangers who can exchange bank transfers to crypto for us. We send the transaction with the agreed amount to the account of your choice and you send us back the corresponding amount in Crypto (BTC, ETH, XMR, whatever you want).We are happy to talk about your percentages privately, so feel free to let us know your ideas.Contact is possible via Telegram, Skype or Jabber. We will send you our ID here via the forum.If you have any questions, offers or want to help us, please contact us via PM. We need daily exchanges with larger sums.Hello, If you don't mind going through KYC/AML, contact us and we'll be glad to help you achieve your ultimate goals.Kind regards,CryptoRolla team

comments.author: Adbitco
comments.body: I will recommend you to go deal directly with exchange without being scammed from users over here, and if I may ask why don't you present the country currency you wishes to deal with maybe you could get attention so easily., ie, if you are only transacting directly to USD account or EUR account holders will get more attention.Or better still p2p service can be easily more recommendable, go to your local thread and source for those who is from same country with to deal with.

comments.author: carnage88
comments.body: I have solution for bank transfer payments. I own unregulated crypto exchange. Msg me for more details.Telegram @papalone
